ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound hot Italian sausage links or sweet Italian sausage links
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1 (16-inch) loaf Italian bread or French bread

cookingTips: Slice sausages lengthwise before browning for better surface area and flavor development
Squeeze the thawed spinach very well to remove excess moisture that would make sandwiches soggy
Heat sandwiches in foil in a warm oven for 5 minutes after assembly to meld flavors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: I want to make impressive sausage sandwiches that are hearty and flavorful. How do I balance the components?
